titles.title: To restrict United States assistance of any kind to Turkey until Turkey uses its influence with the Turkish Cypriot leadership to achieve a settlement on Cyprus based on United Nations Security Council resolutions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 8/1/2001--Introduced. Prohibits U.S. assistance to Turkey until it uses its influence with the Turkish Cypriot leadership to achieve a settlement on Cyprus that calls for certain goals to be met.
